content: Hi all, Brendan Hassett is interested in trying to get someone to submit a Lean-centered proposal for the 2024 Summer@ICERM REU-type program. (I would offer to help organize myself, but I'll be trying to get a MathCorps - https://mathcorps.org/ - branch up and running in New Brunswick then, so I'm out...). If anyone is interested, feel free to reach out to Brendan directly. I think proposals are due rather soon, maybe mid-Sept. Good luck! Best, Alex
Note that we organized LftCM22 at ICERM, and the ICERM people liked it a lot!
And we liked ICERM too: it's a great venue!
